Subtitle.Text: 截至一月二十二日二十四时
累计报告新型冠状病毒

Font.Text: reports of new corona virus infection

Subtitle.Text: 感染的肺炎确诊病例五百七十一例
我们叫了四个小时的车

Font.Text: No one would pick us up

Subtitle.Text: 为什么要冲到前头 替别人卖命啊

Font.Text: How come you are always on the front line?

Subtitle.Text: 生死由命 富贵在天

Font.Text: Life or death, fame and fortune, it's all fate

Subtitle.Text: 紧急通知 武汉长江隧道将暂时关闭

Font.Text: Emergency alert : the Yangtze Tunnel will be temporarily closed

Subtitle.Text: 请在现场工作人员的指挥下 有序撤离隧道

Font.Text: Please follow directions and evacuate calmly

Subtitle.Text: 不要当着客人的面和酒店纠缠

Font.Text: don't argue in front of the guests

Subtitle.Text: 换一个能够接受武汉人的酒店

Font.Text: that would accept guests from Wuhan

Subtitle.Text: 赶快把他们两个搞回来

Font.Text: Get the two of them back quickly

Subtitle.Text: 君君还有三个多月就要生了

Font.Text: Junjun is due in three months

Subtitle.Text: 不老老实实在屋里养胎

Font.Text: not traveling to the other side of the world
now you are helping them stay away?

Subtitle.Text: 我这世界各地有十五个团 都困住回不来

Font.Text: I have 15 tour groups who are stuck right now

Subtitle.Text: 你让我处理下工作好不好

Font.Text: Let me deal with this mess

Subtitle.Text: 你搞清楚一点 是五千 不是五百

Font.Text: Hey let's be clear, it's 5000, not 500

Subtitle.Text: 你不要吵了 好不好
什么时候了 你还添堵

Font.Text: What the hell are you doing?
Go home if you don't know how to drive!

Subtitle.Text: 你下来 来来来 你下来

Font.Text: Get out of the car, come on, get out!
The lotus roots are all gone
all transportation in and out of Wuhan will be shut down

Subtitle.Text: 现场迎来了大批退票人员
我姑娘从深圳回来还可以吗

Font.Text: Can my daughter still come back from Shenzhen?

Subtitle.Text: 十点以后所有离汉通道将会关闭

Font.Text: all transportation will be shut down by 10am

Subtitle.Text: 她不是离汉的 她是回来

Font.Text: She's not leaving Wuhan, she's coming back in

Subtitle.Text: 明天 后天 大后天总得有个时间吧

Font.Text: Tomorrow? The day after? There's got to be a date

Subtitle.Text: 非常抱歉现在还在等通知

Font.Text: I am sorry we must wait for further notice
We don't know at the moment
Okay, please wait for a moment
I am sorry, I am sorry

Subtitle.Text: 钱会全额退还到您的账户

Font.Text: and you'll be refunded in full
Of course in full! It's not my fault

Subtitle.Text: 我也不知道 给你多少合适

Font.Text: I don't know how much to pay you

Subtitle.Text: 这个时候不谈钱 不谈钱

Font.Text: Don't worry about money, not now
We won't be going home for a while
Please don't get out of the car

Subtitle.Text: 你晚上回去 好好消下毒

Font.Text: Make sure to disinfect before going home

Subtitle.Text: 马上封城了 你到底跑哪儿去了

Font.Text: The city is shutting down, where are you going?

Subtitle.Text: 武汉市新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情

Font.Text: Given the situation of new corona virus in Wuhan

Subtitle.Text: 自二零二零年一月二十三日十时起
武汉市全市城市公交 地铁 轮渡

Font.Text: Wuhan public transport, including buses, subways and ferries

Subtitle.Text: 无特殊原因 市民不要离开武汉

Font.Text: all residents are asked not to travel except for special circumstances

Subtitle.Text: 机场 火车站 离汉通道暂时关闭

Font.Text: Airports and train stations will also be closed temporarily

Subtitle.Text: 城都封了 哪个去送啊

Font.Text: The city's shut down, who are doing the deliveries?
Why bother? The whole city is shut

Subtitle.Text: 南北夹击 倾泄三镇

Font.Text: The virus is just like the flood

Subtitle.Text: 江城大疫 危在旦夕

Font.Text: You too can be a hero

Subtitle.Text: 第一 单身独居的优先

Font.Text: Second, always wear a mask and disinfect

Subtitle.Text: 第三 微信群不准聊天

Font.Text: Third, no chitchat in the group

Subtitle.Text: 违者除名 永不录用

Font.Text: You'll be kicked out if you break the rules
I am signing under my own free will

Subtitle.Text: 无论生死 义无反顾

Font.Text: prepared to die for the cause

Subtitle.Text: 奋战到底 绝不服输
这是哪个写的 政府

Font.Text: Your aim is a little high
Are soldiers paid for disaster relief?

Subtitle.Text: 你又瞒着嫂子逞能犯苕

Font.Text: You must be doing this behind your wife's back
Your wife is going to make you suffer
For a man, what's the most important thing?

Subtitle.Text: 病毒我都不怕 我怕老婆

Font.Text: I am not afraid of the virus, or my wife
You go ahead if you want to
I have my kid to think about
I'm not dying for the cause

Subtitle.Text: 事情搞大了 哪个都跑不脱

Font.Text: If the virus rages on, no one can escape

Subtitle.Text: 是红星连锁店的李老板 是吧

Font.Text: Are you Mr. Li, the owner of Red Star Grocery chain?
We want to organize a holiday dinner

Subtitle.Text: 老子让你在公安局看春晚信不信

Font.Text: I'll report you to the police

Subtitle.Text: 请问一下 你们可不可以

Font.Text: Please may I ask for a favor

Subtitle.Text: 喂 你妈的电话打不通

Font.Text: Hi! I'm trying to reach your mom
You were gone for so long

Subtitle.Text: 爸爸 你搞什么去了
做志愿者 那是做好事啊

Font.Text: Why does he have to be a hero?

Subtitle.Text: 他以为他的武术能打得过病毒啊

Font.Text: Does he think his Kungfu can beat the virus?

Subtitle.Text: 不说不说不说嘛 老婆

Font.Text: I am not happy at all

Subtitle.Text: 儿子 你在做什么啊
还没 她年夜饭都没吃

Font.Text: No, she didn't even eat dinner
Is the new installment of Superhero Mowei out?

Subtitle.Text: 还有个小姐姐陪他走天涯
所以你才要帮你妈 多做些事情

Font.Text: I know. You should help Mom

Subtitle.Text: 我不在家 你不要光玩

Font.Text: I am not home, you are the man of the house

Subtitle.Text: 我没玩 我刚帮我妈洗完衣服

Font.Text: Yeah, I just helped her with laundry

Subtitle.Text: 爸爸你看 这个好玩吧
还不睡 小孩不能熬夜
快睡觉 莫惹你妈生气

Font.Text: Go to bed, listen to your mother

Subtitle.Text: 你注意安全啊 爸爸

Font.Text: You know what, give it back!
Don't know what you are talking about
How can you steal disaster relief supplies?
What happened to the protein powder?
Who told you that I took it?

Subtitle.Text: 我没证据 我查不到你头上
我不跟你计较 听到没

Font.Text: and I'll let it go this time

Subtitle.Text: 你要不揩油水 你脸上的N95哪儿来的

Font.Text: Where did you get your N95 mask then?

Subtitle.Text: 我脑袋系在裤腰带上了

Font.Text: Damn it, I am risking my life here

Subtitle.Text: 拿你几箱蛋白粉怎么了

Font.Text: What if I took a few cases of protein powder?
You go by the hospitals every day

Subtitle.Text: 医生 护士 拿命在拼哦

Font.Text: how the doctors and nurses risk their lives?

Subtitle.Text: 蛋白粉是给他们提高免疫力的

Font.Text: The protein powder can boost their immune system
Don't you feel guilty stealing from them?

Subtitle.Text: 我天天提货送货 跑多少地方

Font.Text: I make daily delivery to all these dangerous places
How many people do I come into contact with?
Don't I need to boost my immune system too?

Subtitle.Text: 要不然我对你不客气听到没

Font.Text: I'm not going to fight you
Who do you think you are
I am doing you a favor

Subtitle.Text: 你也把下午那批货接完再走

Font.Text: you are supposed to do this delivery

Subtitle.Text: 你要是再不守规矩 乱发信息

Font.Text: If you send this stupid message again
I am going to make you sorry
Who else can drive a truck?

Subtitle.Text: 他一个黑虎掏心就冲过来了

Font.Text: rushed up with the "the Black Tiger"

Subtitle.Text: 我借力发力 给他来了个釜底抽薪

Font.Text: I laid him out using his own momentum

Subtitle.Text: 你老爸 像不像你看的那个墨卫侠啊

Font.Text: Doesn't Dad look like your Superhero Mowei?
I am waiting to pick up supplies at the check point

Subtitle.Text: 今年压岁钱 收了多少

Font.Text: how much did you get in "red envelops" this year?

Subtitle.Text: 哪有大人找小孩借钱的道理

Font.Text: How can a grownup borrow money from a kid?
Well everyone runs into difficulties once in while
The volunteers are supposed to help
I donated all of my money

Subtitle.Text: 我把医生的东西给搞丢了

Font.Text: I have to make up the difference

Subtitle.Text: 你把钱都捐了 又瞒着我妈吧

Font.Text: You donated all of your money, behind mom's back?

Subtitle.Text: 难怪我妈骂你到处逞强

Font.Text: No wonder Mom complains about you

Subtitle.Text: 你妈对我还是有些偏见的

Font.Text: Your mom is prejudiced against me

Subtitle.Text: 我看我妈那是火眼金睛

Font.Text: I think mom is really sharp

Subtitle.Text: 不是说过吗 在志愿者群里不要聊天

Font.Text: I said no chitchat in volunteer group
That's a lot of pocket money

Subtitle.Text: 这是我妈让我转给你的

Font.Text: Mom gave me the money to send to you

Subtitle.Text: 眼看这都封城十几天了

Font.Text: The city as been shut down for days

Subtitle.Text: 前两天真是把我急死了
这政府的防疫物资来了

Font.Text: Now the government sent all these

Subtitle.Text: 对 这是厚的 要分清楚
还有那些 都是生活用品

Font.Text: and those are consumer goods too

Subtitle.Text: 牙刷 牙膏 毛巾

Font.Text: Tooth brush, tooth paste, hand towel

Subtitle.Text: 所有的货 我都分类

Font.Text: These are all things we need urgently

Subtitle.Text: 这是货物的数量 你帮我签个字

Font.Text: The total count, please sign here

Subtitle.Text: 我门口 一直在过车

Font.Text: There have been ambulances passing through all the time

Subtitle.Text: 我这边也能看到好多救护车

Font.Text: I can see a lot of ambulances here too

Subtitle.Text: 估计是往方舱和雷神山火神山转移病人吧

Font.Text: They are probably moving patients to the isolation sites
